name: TimeTuna
tagline: If Calendly had gorgeous video backgrounds
description: Since the last launch we have: - Rebranded into TimeTuna.com (previously Bookva.ai) - Made video backgrounds available even on free plans - Added more customisation, such as custom logos - Added Microsoft Outlook support (including corporate accounts) - Added a support for read-only calendar sync - Added custom fields (e.g. phone number, Linkedin, meeting purpose) - Rebranded the landing page

name: Monocle 3.0 for macOS
tagline: Noise-cancelling for your ï£¿ screen now with cursor shake
description: Every moment, something steals our focus until we canâ€™t remember what we sat down to do. But it doesnâ€™t have to be this wayâ€¦ â€¦just wiggle your mouse.

name: Netlify AI Gateway
tagline: Use AI models without managing keys or billing
description: Netlify AI Gateway makes it easier to build AI features while youâ€™re vibe coding. Instead of pausing to create provider accounts, manage API keys, or set up billing, AI Gateway securely handles credentials and usage for you. You can call the latest models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google Gemini directly from your Netlify project. Itâ€™s a faster path from experimenting with AI to something ready to run in production.

name: LightBuddy
tagline: Look better on video calls using the screen you already have
description: LightBuddy lives in your Macâ€™s Menu Bar and allows you to add an adjustable ring light around your display. Unlike the built-in feature Apple added in macOS 26.2, LightBuddy supports macOS 14 Sonoma or later, works on Intel and Apple Silicon Macs, and doesn't require an Apple-branded display.

name: Shadow
tagline: AI that sees, listens, and understands every meeting
description: Your meeting AI is missing half the picture. It hears what's said but ignores what's on screen. Shadow captures bothâ€”no bot neededâ€”and turns that full context into action with custom AI tasks. Stop recapping. Start delivering.

name: Mujo AI
tagline: From one photo to a complete set of product visuals and copy
description: Generate ecom product images and copy in minutes. The AI design agent thinks, recommends, and builds tailored visuals and text for you. Fully editable, personalized, and ready to boost sales. It's a conversion-focused system built around ecom best practices.

name: Screenhance
tagline: Make product screenshots look launch-ready in minutes
description: Most screenshot tools are static or require design skills. Screenhance is template-first and animation-native. Turn screenshots into polished visuals or short MP4/GIF clips in minutes. Pick a layout, theme or transparent background, tweak colors and shadows, add subtle motion, and export. Device and browser frames included. Free tier, Week Pass, and Pro.

name: Brill
tagline: Language at your fingertips
description: Brill is a vocabulary-first language learning app built for real life. It doesnâ€™t teach through lessons or exercises. Instead, Brill helps you build vocabulary through repeated exposure â€” on your Home Screen and Lock Screen. It supports 15 languages and focuses on useful, real-world words. Customize what you see, add your own vocabulary, filter by topic, and blur translations for active recall. Lightweight and distraction-free, Brill turns everyday phone glances into steady language progress.

name: Sliq
tagline: Automated data cleaning, in minutes, not hours or days.
description: Fast and accurate AI data cleaning for engineers and analysts. Sliq auto-fixes formats, missing values, and schema issues. Get analysis-ready data, in minutes â€” not hours or days.

name: Voice Mate - AI powered Voicemail
tagline: Missed calls answered, summarized, and delivered instantly
description: With Voice Mate, calls are handled like never before. Your personalized AI gathers the reason for the call, who's calling and if a callback is expected, and sends you a summary right to your phone. Connected to your calendar Voice Mate will add callback requests straight to your agenda

name: Grok Voice Agent API
tagline: Bringing the power of Grok Voice to all developers
description: Grok Voice Agent API lets developers build real-time voice agents using xAI's in-house stack (VAD, tokenizer, audio models). It features <1s latency, function calling, and native multilingual support.

name: Yestoday
tagline: Compare yesterday & todayâ€˜s weather
description: My weather need is simple: is it warmer or colder today? Yestoday shows yesterday and today next to each other, so you instantly know if today is warmer or colderâ€”no digging through screens. To make the daily check feel calm rather than utilitarian, the UI blends in curated oil paintings that echo current conditionsâ€”clear skies, rain, and night scenesâ€”so the atmosphere on screen matches outside.

name: Image Object Removal API
tagline: Remove unwanted objects from images in seconds
description: This API uses state-of-the-art AI to cleanly remove people, objects, text, or background distractions while preserving image quality and realism. âš¡ One-call API â€” simple input, clean output ðŸŽ¯ High-quality inpainting â€” natural, artifact-free results ðŸ§  Works on complex scenes â€” people, shadows, clutter ðŸ’¸ Affordable & fast â€” ideal for production use ðŸ”Œ Built on Replicate â€” easy to integrate

name: Pill Mom
tagline: Never miss a dose again
description: Pill Mom stands out with smart pill bottle scanning - snap a photo and the app identifies your medication using the FDA database. No manual typing. Instead of generic alarms, you get friendly reminders from a caring character who celebrates your streaks. Easily add doctors and pharmacies linked to your medications - everything in one place for refills and questions. Your health data stays private and syncs securely. A clean design makes managing medications easy, not overwhelming.

name: Sip Savvy
tagline: Find Hidden Gems on Any Wine List
description: Stop panic-ordering the second cheapest bottle. ðŸ· Sip Savvy is your pocket sommelier that instantly analyzes restaurant wine lists to find the best value bottles. How it works: ðŸ“¸ Snap a photo â€¢ ðŸ§  AI cross-references retail prices â€¢ âœ… See "Value Scores" to spot gems and avoid markups. Features: Smart OCR on any menu â€¢ Real markup analysis per bottle â€¢ Personalized recommendations. Drink better. Spend smarter. Dine with confidence.

name: LARA | AI That Runs & Optimizes Ads
tagline: AI Agent to Run, Optimize & Scale Meta Ads for Founders
description: LARA is your always-on AI ads partner, built so you can focus on growing your business instead of managing ads. Itâ€™s an autonomous AI agent for Meta Ads that you control through simple chatâ€”no dashboards. LARA works in English and Bahasa Indonesia, generates ad creatives or uses yours, builds smart audiences including retargeting, launches lead and sales campaigns, and optimizes 24/7 by cutting losing ads and scaling winners.

name: LifeGrid
tagline: Connect your daily tasks to what actually matters
description: LifeGrid connects your daily tasks to your life goals through three layers: Strategy (Life Areas + OKRs) Tactics (Projects + Habits) Action (Daily Focus). LifeGrid is an operating system for your life. Ensuring every task you complete moves you toward your goals.

name: aicofounder.com
tagline: Make something people actually want
description: aicofounder gives you the structure you have been looking for to go from idea to a product people actually want. Over 20,000 founders research and build their product with their AI cofounder.
